111.content: What causes Springfield's own Bart Simpson to gain weight?
111.title: Bart

1111.content:
(Chapter is from the original)

Bart had always been pretty fat, but his skating had always staved off the extra pounds that would've piled on, but after
Homer came home in a drunken haze, tripping over Bart's beloved skateboard (conveniently left at the bottom of the stairs),
Bart began to gain. Slowly at first...

Bart groaned as he got out of bed. His old green PJs are getting tighter and tighter every day. He was still a little pissed
that his dad had smashed his skateboard, but this had sent Bart down a new path. He'd always been fat - his baby-photos
showed a plump, blonde boy, wriggling around in his crib...why not go all the way? He'd been fat for years...why not just get
fatter!?

This idea had already occurred to Marge, who had something already set downstairs!

"C'mon bart! Breakfast!"
"I'm coming! I'm coming!"
"Get down here boy!"

The stairs creak as Bart waddles down, his green PJs beginning to stretch tight...

"Woah!"

The entire dining-room table is filled with food! Sitting down in a chair without armrests, he began to eat while Lisa heaped
more and more food onto his plate. Marge was kept busy in the kitchen, cooking and baking...after three hours solid eating
1111.title: Big Bart

Lace his food with weight gain powders and give him wg shakes

your help."

"How would you feel that we both work together to make Bart too fat to attend here?" Homer asked.

A smile formed on Skinner's face, "I like it but how should we go along starting this?"

"Well..." Homer replied

The councilor confronted them and told them all to...

(Chapter is from the original)

Bart walked casually up to Milhouse, Martin, and Nelson.

"What're you in for?" he asked boredly, glancing at his stomach. He saw that it peeked out from under his shirt.

"My dad said that he can't afford to feed me anymore, or buy me new clothes," said Milhouse. "So he sent me to fat camp so he
wouldn't have to worry about it anymore. Plus, now he's making more than enough money at Starbucks to support himself."

"Ha-ha, you're dirt poor!" laughed Nelson.

"Am not!" yelled Milhouse.

"Are too!" said Bart. "Why else would you wear the same pink shirt every day? That was your mom's when she was ten!"

choices: Ask the other kids what happened with them
Go to the cafeteria for some food
111111121.content:
Milhouse ran away, sobbing, and Bart stared after him for a moment.

"So," he said casually to Nelson. "What're you in for?"

"Oh, the usual..."

FLASHBACK

Skinner is talking in front of the school in the auditorium, and Jimbo wads up a piece of paper and throws it at him.

"What infernal maniac..." Skinner mutters as he bends over to pick the paper up, giving the students clear view of his
behind. His buttcrack is showing slightly.

"Ha-ha, the principal's a fat-ass!" Nelson shouts, pointing at his butt.

"Well!" Skinner says angrily as the entire auditorium bursts into laughter. "I have never heard such repulsive use of the
word 'fat-ass' in all my years of teaching! We'll see whose buttocks hang over our pants when you're out of fattening camp,
boy!"

END FLASHBACK

"Whoa, that sucks man," Bart said in sympathy.
111111121.title: Milhouse Leaves Crying

1111112.content:
(Chapter is from the original)

The counselor smiled broadly at the new arrivals. A good-sized mixture of boys and girls in a good-sized mixture of sizes.
This should be interesting, he thought. "Children, welcome to Camp Seamsplitter!" he shouted warmly. "Here at our specialty
fat camp, your days will be occupied with eating! We serve nine mandatory meals a day! Between meals you will relax in our
luxurious cabins, each featuring multiple televisions with access to over 600 cable channels, as well as the latest video
game systems, and high-speed Internet connections! Additionally, the cabins are fully stocked with the best, tastiest, and
most fattening snack foods in the world! Snacking between meals is encouraged!"

The children murmured uncertainly. Martin raised a hand. "Sir? Correct me if I'm wrong, but isn't the purpose of a fat camp
to lose surplus weight?" The counselor smiled again, walked up to Martin, and looked him straight in the eye. "Well, now,
that would be a thin camp, wouldn't it now, son?" he grinned.

The kids admitted that he had a good point.

"Now, everybody, off to the mess hall! It's time for your first meal at Camp Seamsplitter! And trust me, it's far from your
last!" the counselor shouted. Watching the children scamper off to the mess hall, he smiled yet again. The children had no
idea that every scrap of food in the camp had been treated with special additives that would cause them to...
1111112.title: Go Ahead and Eat

choices: One week later, at weigh-in time...
11111121.content:
(Chapter is from the original)

His belly rumbling with hunger, Bart reached the mess hall seconds ahead of the other campers. He, and everyone else, stopped
short as they entered the hall and stared in slack-jawed amazement at the sight before them.

Food. Piles and piles of more food than any of them had ever seen in their lives. And when the mouth-watering scent of that
food hit their nostrils, the campers raced to the tables faster than anything and dug in. Cries of joy immediately rose from
the children. This was the best, most delicious food any of them had ever eaten!

Driven by the desire to experience as much of this exquisite deliciousness as possible, the children began eating faster. So
consumed were they by the heavenly taste, none of them even noticed that their bodies were gradually expanding with fat from
the specially-prepared food. Plump bellies emerged from underneath shirts, hips bulged over waistbands, chins multiplied like
rabbits with Viagra for blood.

As the children ate and grew, the camp staff took special notice of Bart, who was packing away more than any other camper
present. He was eating so much so quickly, one could actually see him bloating larger and larger. His belly had already
overtaken his entire lap, despite the best efforts of his fattening legs to make said lap as wide as possible. His shirt had
rode up so far against his belly and fat back that the crack of his massive butt could be seen just above the waistband of
his overstressed shorts.

Eventually, a bell was rung, signaling the end of the first of the day's nine meals. The children laid back in their seats,
so overwhelmed by how unbelievably delicious the food had been that they didn't even care about their increased girth. A few
of them clearly enjoyed the added poundage, perhaps considering it a badge of honor. All the campers had gained between 30
and 50 pounds, but Bart had surpassed them all. Even though the portions of food only added a little amount of weight each,
it had added up due to sheer size of Bart's repast. Bart had gained 93 pounds in a single meal! His clothes, strained by both
the boy's size and the rapidity of the gain, now barely fit him. Aided by a staff member, he heaved his new bulk out of his
seat and rejoined his classmates. Milhouse had gained 41 pounds, Martin 33 pounds, and Nelson had added 45 pounds to his
already chunky frame. They expressed their congratulations to Bart over his gain, and together they waddled off to their
cabin to relax and await their next meal.

111112.content:
Principal Skinner's smile became a little sinister at the thought of that plan. "Looks like we have a deal! I can get weight gain powders and shakes, no problem!" he said to Homer.

With that said and done, Homer thought about how to execute the plan. He could be sneaky about it, sneaking powder into Bart's food, or he could just give the powder to Bart. He didn't seem to mind his extra weight as it is, and he wouldn't miss a chance to miss school.

Homer decided to tell Bart about the plan. Even if Bart didn't want to, Homer could just go with the first plan and sneak the powder into Bart's food.

That afternoon, Bart arrived home, only to have Homer tell him to get to his room, which Bart did, confused.

Bart was expecting Homer to barge in and strange him, but to his surprise, Homer wasn't angry at all. In fact, he asked a question that Bart always wanted to hear.

"How would you like to stop going to school?" Homer asked, with Bart immediately saying, "That'd be awesome! But how are we going to do it?"

Homer then said, "We just fatten you up until you can't go to school anymore. I'm even getting weight gain powders and shakes!"

Bart...

"I love it! Let's go do that right now!" Bart exclaimed. Homer then too his obese son home, where Bart was greeted with a table filled with even more food than in the morning. "Dig in, sweetie." Marge said, as Bart munched on the feast.
Marge and Lisa, as Bart ate, made more food to replace the food Bart ate, and with the Weight Fain Powder, it caused the gain to go faster.
Bart ate and ate, until he finished all the food. "Ready for desserts, my plump little guy?" Marge asked. Bart nodded his fat face, and dove into the Double-chocolate Cookies, Triple Fudge Brownies and the multiple layered cakes, all making Bart fatter.

His pants gave way many pounds ago, and his shirt was starting to tear, revealing his massive golden stomach. Bart finished the meal, and burped loudly as a sign of accomplishment. "Woah... I don't think I'll ever eat that much in my entire life..." Bart stated, breathing heavily from the eating.

"Well, Bart? Are you full? Can we weigh you?" Homer asks.
1111121.title: Loved the plan, and wanted to get fatter right ...

"Yeh, I'm full lets see how much I weigh." Bart replied.
Homer when into the bathroom to get the scale and brought it into the kitchen. When Homer set the scale Bart steped on it and he weighed...
11111211.title: Full, weigh Bart

1112.content:
Bart was lying in his bed, playing with his belly, only wearing a pair of shorts and underwear. He didn't like his small belly. Despite how much he disliked the thought of being his dad, he still wanted to be big and fat, eat a ton and have a belly that shows for it. He tried his best to eat as much as possible, but his Mother stopped him, and he didn't have any money to move away. So, he was stuck.
However, one day during school, Bart was called to the Principal's Office.

"Bart, there's a man here who wants to talk with you. If you wouldn't mind, in private." Bart nodded and walked with the man. "Listen... Bart, was it? I've heard a few things about you. You don't care about good grades or being the coolest dude around. Deep down, you just want to be... Bigger." The man said. Bart was a bit shocked, "How did you know?" The man looked around, "Lucky guess. But that's not the point, the point is I can make all your dreams come true. Alone, in your own place. Eat as much as you like, for as long as you like. You in?" Bart looked at him with wide eyes. This was a big question, and he'd have to come up with an answer...
1112.title: He wants to be bigger and fatter.

choices: Homer has a plan, but with a downside.
Homer has a very risky idea.
11121.content:
"I would love to, but... I think I should tell my parents. Shouldn't they know where I'm going?" Bart asked. "Of course. When you've come to a decision, meet me by the Springfield Docks. I'll be the one in the trench coat and hat. Can't miss me." He then scurried off behind a corner and vanished.

"You want to do what?" Marge asked, a bit shocked after Bart explained his story. "I'm sorry, Bart, but those kind of places aren't right. A bit too shady for my like... what if they cut you up?" "C'mon, Mom! I promise it's not like that!" Bart pleaded, but Marge's foot was down. She wouldn't budge. Bart, despair rushing down his face, walked up to his room and laid face-down into his pillow.
"Hey, Bart." Homer said as he walked past Bart, crying into his pillow. "Heard you wanted to go to a place where you could do whatever you want." "Not anymore, because Mom won't let me." Bart cried. Homer, desperate to make his son happy, tried to think of a plan.
11121.title: Ask his parents.

choices: A large warehouse, filled to the brim with food.
A magical cookbook, which allowed you to get whatever food you wanted.
111211.content:
"Bart, listen. If you want to go there, all you'd need to do is bring me! I'll protect you if anything goes wrong, and I won't judge or watch. It'll be your time to be just Bart." Homer explained. Bart sniffed up some sadness snot, "Well... if you think it'll work, I suppose we have no other plan..." Bart states. "That's right, boy. I'm gonna treat you to the best time of your life!"

Marge, after much convincing, allowed Bart to go with Homer so long as they didn't stay for over 5 months. She expected them back by then, and if they didn't return, she'd assume them both to be dead. "Duly noted." Homer stated. They both left for the Springfield docks at 9:30 p.m. In the darkness, they could barely see a man in a Trench Coat next to a Dingy Boat. He nodded, and told Homer that he'd need to stay behind. "But, I need to be with my kid." Homer said. "Listen. This is Bart's time, and I can't be held responsible for 2 people on that island. Here..." He hands Homer $2,000. "Go play with that while Bart's away. If your wife asks, I'll put in a good word. You have nothing to worry about, Bart'll be just fine." "Uhh, Homer, don't you think that-" Bart was stopped by Homer's childlike glee, as he pranced off with the 2 grand.

The Man rowed for what seemed like years. Until they reached an island with a small hut, and a mountain. "Here we are. Go inside the hut when you're hungry, drink the water surrounding the island when thirsty, and there's a hammock for when you're tired. The clothes are expandable, so they instantly fit perfectly on any size, shape or form. Use it to your advantage. That's it, kid. Just yell for me when you want to go home." The man explained, but Bart was so excited he could hardly contain himself. He rushed into the island, and immediately went into the Hut. Inside it, there was...
111211.title: Homer has a plan, but with a downside.

choices: He misses his weight gain from the episode King-Sized Homer.
112.title: Homer

choices: "Bart, do you think I should get fatter... again?"
"Bart... do you think I should lose this weight and be thin?"
"Bart, I want to get fat again... and I think you should gain with me!"
1122.content:
Homer rose early one morning and let out a yawn. He looked at the alarm clock and sighed. 5:00 A.M. He was tired as hell but couldn't manage to stay asleep. Just the other day he had gone through a liposuction paid for by his boss. Apparently he earned it by saving the town from something that wouldn't have happened if he was just at his work. From the get go Homer was a little disappointed by this. Losing all the weight Bart helped him put on meant he had to go back to work every day and couldn't get and disability bonuses. Bart was also pissed that his dad was back to his normal, only overweight yet not obese, self. Still, Marge and Lisa seemed happy about it so Homer decided to be positive about it as well.

However, since losing that weight Homer felt as if something was missing in his life. He'd rest his hand on his stomach and expect a cushy mound but it just wouldn't be there. At night he'd lie awake, unused to the lack of softness his flabby body used to comfort him with. And all of a sudden now that he weighed less people expected him to move! Why did he have to get up and walk around? As the days passed Homer started to hate this limbo of being too skinny to experience the comforts of obesity, yet too fat to be fit.

Things were bound to change when Marge and Lisa left town for a week to attend a saxophone convention, leaving Bart and Homer alone. Homer, still in his pajamas, sulked downstairs and plopped down next to Bart on the couch and proceeded to drown himself in violent cartoons. Both boys occasionally looked over at Homer's gut and sighed or pouted or frowned. Eventually Homer broke the silence.
1122.title: He misses his weight gain from the episode King...

choices: No limits, just getting fatter and fatter
11221.content:
Both boys occasionally looked over at Homer's gut and sighed or pouted or frowned. Eventually Homer broke the silence, "Bart, do you think I should get fatter... again?" Homer said, looking down at his belly and placing his hand on it.

"Huh?" Bart said, sort of confused as he didn't know his dad actually wanted that after the Liposuction.

"Do you think I should get fatter again?" Homer asked once again, "well...I uh...yeah. I miss your big belly, the way your polo shirt couldn't cover it, the way your belly bounced with each step. How it would get caught on the towel rack when we did your weigh ins...you worked so hard for all that fat and now its just gone" Bart said with a sad look on his face, Homer placed his hand on Bart's shoulder "I know boy...I miss those things too. It was an amazing feel carrying around all that weight, playing with my belly, rubbing it and bouncing it and just being able to eat and eat and eat, watching the scales rise to 315lbs...but not only that." Homer said, "what dad?" Bart asked, "Not only that....but it was something we bonded over. Father and Son, getting me fatter and fatter each day"

"Yeah dad...I miss that too, and since you lost it all. You don't seem happy, you were happy being so fat", "that's true Bart...I feel sad now without it", Homer stood up and lifted his polo shirt above his belly, he grabbed his ample yet small belly at the sides and lifted it up and down "like I said last time...All my life I have been an obese man trapped inside a fat mans body...And me getting to 315 and being happy proved that"

Bart stood up and rubbed his dads bare belly. "Then lets do this dad...Lets get you fatter again!", "Yeah boy!! I am so psyched for this! I need to stuff my belly now!!" Homer said in excitement that he was on a quest to gain once more.

"One question though dad...how big do you want to get?" Bart asked

Homer thought for a minute and said....

I want to get passed my highest of 315lbs, I want to see how fat I can get, I want my clothes to rip and shred unable to hold back my ever growing belly, to maybe shut down a restaurant because I eat their entire supply of food, maybe one day I'll just be a huge immobile blob reaching ultimate fatness. I just know that I was huge at 315lbs, just think what I'll look like with an extra 100lbs or 400lbs on top of that?" Homer said with pride

"Wow dad, that's incredible" Bart said smiling, "Thanks boy! Now what are we standing around here for? There's food out there that's dying to make my belly enormous!" Homer said and slapped his belly. Homer and Bart left the house and got into the car

5 minutes later they were....

choices: He just wants to get fatter!

11232.content:
Homer Simpson just wanted to fat, he was by no means thin weighing in at 239lbs but the idea of just eating and growing fatter was just something he had always wanted. Deep down he knew he was an obese man and he wanted that on the surface, sure he had gained weight to get on disability before but that is not what this was about. Homer just knew he wanted to grow a huge fat belly, to show it off with pride as he waddled down the street with it bouncing in front of him and being unable to cover it with his clothes.

Homer knew that with Marge and the girls away it was a perfect opportunity to gain as much weight as he could. He enlisted the help of Bart who gladly helped Homer on his previous quest to gain, but this time he knew his dad was never going to be thin again no matter how much Marge nagged him to lose it when the time came.

It had been a week since Homer decided to start gaining, he and Bart had visited Dr.Nick to get more ideas on how to gain faster and more giving Homer the advice to follow what he told him before but even when he was full to stuff himself further until no more could literally go in. And stuff he did, Homer devoured huge meals on top of huge meals since going to Dr.Nicks and the results were showing.

Homer and Bart sat in a booth in Krusty Burger, the table covered in wrappers and empty drinks. 'Here dad, this is the last one' Bart said handing his dad the burger and watching in quiet awe 'Thanks boy, down the hatch!' Homer said taking a huge bite out of it, then another and another until it was all gone. Homer swallowed it all down and sat back, 'woo, that was great!' Homer said, 'yeah dad your appetite is really increasing, as well as the size of your belly!' Bart said, 'hehe thanks boy, it takes a lot to get a belly this big' Homer said, 'but you're nowhere near done are you?' Bart asked, 'heck no Bart! I'm in this for the long haul!' Homer said with a huge smile.

Bart and Homer left the booth and Homer stood up, revealing that his white polo shirt didn't cover his belly any more. A good few inches of new soft belly fat had grown around his middle, showing off his belly button area perfectly. Homer smiled and rubbed the bare skin and the two headed to the car.

On their way home, Bart spotted a new Donut place, 'Hey look Dad! A new donut shop has opened' Bart said, 'wow...mmmm donuts' Homer said, 'but I'm really full...maybe next time' Homer said, 'But dad Dr.Nick said you're to stuff yourself until no more can go in!' Bart said and reached over and poked Homer's belly, 'and there is some give there, so you can clearly fit more!' Bart said

Homer thought for a second and decided
11232.title: He just wants to get fatter!

choices: it looked like he'd gained some
112331.content:
Bart sat there on the sofa staring at his father, he couldn't help but look at Homer's belly and feel sad that only a short while ago he was a whopping 315lbs...now because of Marge, he had liposuction that took him back down to his regular 239lbs.

Bart loved it when his dad was gaining, he let Bart assist him and helped him with belly rubs and pushing his ample midsection off of the towel rack when it got stuck on there during his time on the scales. He also missed the soft feel and how Homer's clothes fit him when he got hugely fat, he didn't like the muumuu as it covered up Homer's belly but even that couldn't hide how fat Homer had become...now that was all gone and Bart hated it.

Marge had taken Lisa and Maggie with Patty and Selma on a girls only cruise, so they would be gone for months. This was the perfect time for Bart to hatch his master fat plan and get Homer back to his truly happy self of being hugely obese....maybe even passed that, Homer wasn't the most observant of people so he may not even realise he'd gained weight until it was too late to turn back. Part of Bart felt guilty for doing this, but this was only a small feeling, the rest of him was telling him to go for it.

That night Bart crept out of the house with Homer's wallet, he did it slowly and quietly as to awaken the slumbering fatty upstairs. He went down to Krusty Burger and picked up 5 Krusty burger meals with 5 extra fattening shakes and somehow managed to carry it all home. He went into the bedroom and spoke softly to Homer "Homer...its dinner time" Bart said and wafted the burgers under his nose, "mmm....dinner" the sleepy Homer said, Bart was scared he would wake up but he didn't. He placed the first burger near Homer's mouth and Homer took a bite and swallowed, Homer must have been dreaming about eating because he kept asking for more after each bite of the burgers and each handful of fries. Bart couldn't believe this was happening, he didn't expect Homer to not wake up...this was going to be easier than he thought.

After a good hour, Homer had managed all 5 of the krusty burger meals. Bart slowly and carefully peeled back the quilt from his dad and gentle rubbed his belly, he couldn't help but notice how full it felt and how much bigger it already looked with so much food inside it. Bart undid some of the buttons of his dads pajama shirt and began to rub the bare and soft belly that was beneath. Homer seemed to enjoy this as he was smiling throughout.

Suddenly Homer shifted and rolled onto his back, his belly looking even bigger as it rose high above him. This was the perfect opportunity for Bart to pour the milkshakes down his mouth and into his belly. 11513.content:
Nelson rarely got the opportunity to spoil himself. With his mother's money problems (not helped in the least by her drinking habit), there was nothing he could do for himself that cost more than the lunch money he stole from his peers. Now though, his mother was taking a trip to meet up with a "friend", and he was left to his own devices for about a month or so.

Thankfully, he'd taken a part-time the previous year, and the money left over combined with the lunch money he'd stolen came up to just over $900. Obviously not enough for him to indulge in luxury for the whole month, but enough to allow him a bit of freedom.

His stomach grumbled obnoxiously. He flicked through his wad of cash, wondering what his first meal alone should be. He licked his lips. No matter what he chose, he was sure he wanted to let go and really pig out.

choices: It was Fat Tony carrying a box of donuts
It's one of his officers, there's been an industrial accident
1153332.content:
Commissioner Clancy Wiggum sat at his desk nervously munching on a bag of chips. The state's new initiave of manditory minimum levels of fittness had him concerned. All law enforcement officers without a work-related disability would have to be able to run a mile within ten minutes and a BMI below 45.0, any current officers were expected to complete a test of it within the month. Knowing the officers on his force were well motivated to never run after their initial physical he expected almost no one would be able to meet this. With, at least in his mind, heroic grace he realized the solution this problem.

Clicking the "EDIT" button on the premade brief sent to him by the state capitol, he changed the requirements to a mile in 100:00 minutes and having no more than a BMI of 450.0. Chuckling he saved the changes and sent out the memo to his officers per the instructions given. Chuckling with the brilliance of his plan he put his feet up and went back to the kind of police work he loved... putting the bag up to his mouth and mindlessly eating his way though the 14 serving party size bag which made up his third snack that afternoon.

Wiggum loved his life, as police commissioner he had only the mayor as a boss who was just as corrupt and lazy as he was, well maybe not AS lazy which gave him free reign to spend his days eating the complementary kickback snacks local businesses and markets would send him to ensure better policing of their stores. Was he supposed to take bribes? No, but Wiggum never thought that a two dozen box of donuts, or a weekly sheet cake from the baker was really a bribe to begin with, more like incentive to stop by more often in his off hours for more to eat. If there was one thing Wiggum loved more than his job, it was food and it showed; at 360 pounds on his stout 5'9" stature he was practically spherical squeezing into his 56" stretch-waist police pants which had started getting tight.

As he reached the end of his bag of chips, slightly out of breath and with a light squeal of his old asthma sounded just like the pig he was coming out of his airway he rubbed his soft middle. Recently Wiggum was finding he enjoyed not only eating, but the effect it had on his physique, he would occasionally glance at new strechmarks or notice a fold looking softer when getting out of the shower and found them oddly exciting. Breaking out of his trance saw someone standing at his office door who began to knock. Getting back to a more professional posture and wiping the crumbs of his gluttony off his uniform he uttered in his nasily tone, "Come in" and the person entered.
1153332.title: Chief Wiggum

choices: Wiggum decides to stop by on his way home after work.
11533321.content:
Fat Tony, the formerly fit cousin of the deceased gangster Fat Tony made his way into Wiggum's office. Despite being a well-kept 180 lbs when he moved to Springfield six years ago, the stress of running his newly inherited "legitimate businesses" had clearly taken a toll on Tony to the point where he now had to shift sideways through the doorway, his immense gut encased in a tremendous tracksuit which would never be used for exercise again, the jacket unzipped Tony's thick body hair could be seen through the thin tank top he wore underneath and especially in the two inches of gut which were left uncovered by it. Wiggum was surprised by just how much the gangster had put on since they last met for his biannual bribe/ dinner with an important small businessman in the community which kept Wiggum out of his hair unless his hand was forced. Tony approached Wiggum carrying a large box of donuts in one hand, munching on one from the box with the other, each lumbering step sending a ripple across his gelatinous form.

"Commissioner... I hope that my unscheduled appearance does not interrupt your busy schedule." Tony said smoothly after finishing cramming the second half of the donut into his mouth. "I recently opened a new business I thought might be to your interest, a doughnut shop a block away from the station." Tony said, setting the box of doughnuts on Wiggum's desk and showing him the logo on the box.

"You're getting into business with my favorite food? What's your angle here Tony?" Commissioner Wiggum replied.

"No angle, I'm a bit too curvy for those these days" Tony replied, patting his gut for effect "I started it because I figured with as many donuts as I've been eating recently I might as well get a discount beyond a stamp for each dozen I got." He continued to explain while opening the box to Wiggum's excited face. "I opened it so close by so my friends with the Springfield Police could get a snack any time day or night, we're proudly offering a 25% off discount to all law enforcement and military servicemen. That said because we're such good friends I'll tell my staff for you it's buy one get one free" Tony said as Wiggum managed to finish shoving his first donut in at once.

The Commissioner was stunned by how good the doughnut was, soft and chewy while the glaze gave a light crunch. It was his heaven! He grabbed one with each hand and began stuffing himself. Tony laughed and bid him a good afternoon. Waddling out Tony muttered something to himself that Wiggum couldn't make out, not that he cared. He had 20 more donuts to eat!
11533321.title: It was Fat Tony carrying a box of donuts

115333211.content:
Commissioner Wiggum dug into his new snacks like he hadn't eaten in a week. The box was a fairly diverse assortment and he hadn't tried one he didn't love! Polishing off the entire box in less than 10 minutes he found himself momentarily contented while he rubbed his belly and happily moaned. The donuts were great and if this was Tony's way of keeping him off his back, it sat fine with Wiggum.

The commissioner finished off the rest of his afternoons work after that. Not much to do as he delegated every possible task he could to his subordinates but some things did require his signature still. Finishing almost an hour ahead of schedule, he looked at the empty box he had stacked on top of his already full wastebasket and thought about how great those donuts had been. His belly grumbled in agreement and as a reminder he hadn't eaten in two hours. Calling it an early day Wiggum dislodged himself from his desk chair and made his way to the car.

Tony had not been kidding when he said it was down the street, only a block over from the station and even located on the way between work and home! The business, Fat Tony's Donuts hid nothing about the owner, probably a marketing trick Wiggum thought, if the owner's a big guy a consumer could think they know what they're doing or something like that he concluded. Wiggum pulled in and followed the signage they had for their drive through window. He ordered a dozen donuts from the teenage employee who seemed to work everywhere else too, the skinny youth recognized the Commissioner and let him know they'd be giving him a free second dozen like Tony had mentioned, and generously the advertised 25% serviceman discount too. Paying $7.50 for two baker's dozen had Wiggum short of breath with excitement, donuts were his favorite food and this was better AND cheaper than the other stores in town. He drove home absent mindedly eating out of the first dozen he was done by the time he got home. He carried the second box in, not noticing the way his 5XL shirt strained between the buttons.

1153332112.content:
Don Fat Tony was rather annoyed. Out of nowhere he had just recieved a phone call from one of his employees, the irritatingly squeaky voice of the teen had incised Tony as the issue in question was stupidly petty; a customer had dropped their donut and wanted a free replacement. How stupid Tony thought to himself could this kid be? Just give them a new one." He wanted to make sure calls like this never came to him again and to that end set the store policy in no uncertain terms. He and his driver/ associate Louie got in his car and drove over to the new store.

Going inside the shop Tony found the Teenager in the back on break, checking his smartphone to kill time. The teenager didn’t notice he had been knocked to the floor until he saw the tightly-clad 8XL's worth of backside headed toward him. Tony couldn’t hear the muffled words of his employee, he didn’t need to. Kneading and wobbling his digestive track heavily he felt the gas buildup he was hoping for. Tony relaxed and released a long fart which reverberated across his body. Satisfied with the punishment he rolled off the thin lanky teen and after a moment to stand up placed one of his tree-trunk thick legs on his chest pinning him in place.

“I will give you a warning for your wasting of my time, so I wanted to this opportunity as your boss to give you specific instructions on how to settle any dispute here.” Tony said reaching for a recently made, still warm glazed doughnut. “At previous jobs you’ve mentioned a desire to ask the manager…” *munch munch munch* *gulp* “...never ask me regarding any problems.” Tony said reaching for another but keeping a crushing weight on the teen’s chest. “Just feed these cattle we have for customers more donuts to keep them satisfied, if there’s a problem, fix it by giving them enough food that they start eating and shut up.” Tony crammed the entire doughnut into his bloated face in one mouthful and swallowing just as quick, “Keep the customers happy, I’ll be happy, and we’ll never have to have a conversation like this again." Tony paused and signaled to Louie to pass him a carton of milk from the nearby refrigerator which he gulped down rapidly. "Take the rest of the day off - I’ll still pay for the rest of your hours today, come back and never question your orders again”. Tony took his foot off and the teen took his first full breath of air since Tony had sat on him.

“Louie stay here the rest of the evening as my eyes, and make sure the other employees get the message about how to deal with any problems around here, and keep an eye on our 'quality control' you know how important it is to me to follow our recipes to the letter.” Fat Tony made his way to the front of the store again with no one else any the wiser to what had taken place.

Having the other employee box him up a dozen Tony left the place satisfied with the day’s events. Being bigger certainly was having its advantages.
1153332112.title: Back in the kitchen of Fat Tony's Donuts....

11533321121.content:
Wiggum woke up the next day with a snort, shifting his bulk vertically he admired his thick spherical belly's shape and softness. He got up while his wife slept peacefully. She wouldn't need to get up for several hours and he didn't find it necessary to wake her. He spent the usual 20 minutes on the can before getting in the shower, his gut seemed to reach the wall a little sooner than he had remembered recently. Drying off he went to get dressed and found even "sucking in" as much as he could his pants wouldn't buckle. Figuring that he didn't want to go in with any embarrassing compromises to his uniform it was as good of an excuse as any other to take the day off while finding new pants . He had months of time off saved up, why bother when he could nap the day away in the office he'd always figured.

Grabbing a pair of elastic shorts which could go past his 56" pants admiring the effect of the tight cotton fabric on his spherical form. He got in his car and started heading to the mall. Halfway there he realized the store he wanted to go to probably wouldn't be open until a bit later in the morning. Needing something to do and given his rumbling stomach, something to eat! Wiggum made his way back to Fat Tony's Donuts for an extended breakfast. Since he had a few hours to kill Wiggum made his way inside to sit down and relax. Sitting at the counter inside on a wide, sturdy stool, Wiggum had the clerk drop off a dozen of whatever looked good to the kid and a pile of milk cartons getting the extra dozen made Wiggum smile, 26 donuts would take him some time. He sat and watched as a good number of Springfield's residents came in to try the new store during their morning commute. Saying hi to anyone who noticed the porcine cop Wiggum he enjoyed spending a few hours with a newspaper and munching on donuts. Finally at around 9:30 Wiggum finished his last maple round and made his way to the door. He arrived at the mall and given the weekday morning crowd found easy parking. He made it to the plus size store The Vast Wasteband and meet the man at the counter. The experienced clerk knew of Wiggum's position having supplied his special order uniforms for several years and had pants which would meet his needs. To be sure he brought out his soft cloth tape and held it around Wiggum's waistline.

Yes there we are, 58" for the waist and 24" for the legs. You're moving up huh?" The tailor said to Wiggum teasingly. He brought out 4 pairs of size 58" and then also brought out two pairs of 60", "Sadly none of these are in your length and will need to be hemmed which won't be a problem but will take a little time. I can have a few of these ready by the end of the day. That said to prevent this happening in the future would you be interested in a pair in a larger size. I have these 60" pairs and can order bigger still, if I put it in they can tailor it more specifically to you for little extra, they'd fit that much more comfortably though over the standard pattern. Wiggum thought that sounded pretty good, considering how much he was liking those donuts and the feeling of his full figure, he decided to give it a shot.

"Not a bad idea there, lets get me 4 pairs of the 58 now, and instead of those 60's get me a custom order for..."

11533321121212.content:
Wiggum oinked in surprise at the result, he had put on so much weight but seeing the number on the wall made him run his hands across his spherical form all the same putting it in place.

"Well now, not the high score but I think you're the winner under the 'civil servants' category." Dr. Hibbert chuckled to himself patting the Commissioner on the back. They continued down the hall to confirm his height and noting the result the two entered the exam room. "At 5'9" and 620 pounds..." the Doctor said doing some quick math, "Your BMI would be just a bit over 90, since we classify obesity at 30 I'd say you're excelling there".

"I could do without the wise cracks Doc, despite the numbers I've been feeling like a 20 year old again." Hibbert seemed to be interested. "How so?" He inquired looking at a man whose chest spanned close to two yards across.

"I've been... on this new diet you see, ever since I started it I'm feeling more relaxed, haven't felt my heart pound in my chest once, even when Ralph got ahold of my gun the other day!" Dr Hibbert shrugged and said, "Well in my professional opinion a man should probably not be your size without having a few risk factors, I'd like to take a blood sample and a few measurements." Wiggum obliged, way less stern than he would have expected.

A few days later he got a call from Dr. Hibbert personally, perks of his importance he figured cramming the half a donut he had left from the box down his throat before picking up the line on hold. "Hello Commissioner, didn't want to waste your important time coming down here, just wanted to let you know your tests came back better than most of my patients, whatever you've been doing seems to be just fine". Wiggum rubbed his belly enjoying how much of it was buried in his lap. 90 BMI huh? He'd have to fix that...

1221.content:
Marge is surprised, between Homer and Bart there are never left overs, in fact rarely is there enough for her. There must be something going on, some shenanigan of the week that they are up to, or perhaps she really did just make so much that even they could not eat it all, either way this is a rare treat for her.
With the kids put to bed and Homer off to Moe's Tavern she can sit down and actually eat enough to feel full.

She lays the meal out before her, jeeze there really is a lot here, but no worry, whatever she doesn't eat she can use as left overs tomorrow, and so she digs in happy to enjoy this moment of peace to herself between the usual states of chaos her household is in.
She eats and eats and eats, though she feels full she is enjoying herself too much to stop and just eats even more. So rare is it that she gets to just treat herself she is getting a little carried away. Eventually though she has managed to eat the entire meal and is bloated like never before. She feels so heavy and lethargic but at the same time content and happy. She slowly makes her way upstairs and pours herself a bath, lights some candles and gets a nice book.
She's already indulged this far, why not pamper herself just a little bit further, it'll help the stomach pain settle.

By the time homer comes home drunk as always, Marge has gone to bed feeling content like never before. She thinks to herself "this was wonderful, perhaps i should treat myself more often" and closes her eyes relaxed, happy, and still stuffed to the brim.

Panicking as he sees the liquid has now been absorbed by the food Homer looks around at what to do. He doesn't want to get caught, heaven forbid he upset his family and deal with that.
Thinking himself smart he fills the vial with water to the same level as it had been and puts it upright on the top shelf and then closes the fridge "Homer J Simpson, you genius!" he says to himself and sneaks off to bed, forgetting about getting anything to eat.

1241.content:
Winter vacation has come at last and Edna cannot leave the school fast enough. For her Springfield Elementary is the bane of her existance, every day she smokes and drinks because of how much she hates that place, and yet, once upon a time she was a bright eyed teacher who was eager to make a difference in her student's lives...
And then she met BART SIMPSON.

He crushed her spirit, he ruined her dream job, and now as she finally flees the building eager to escape it's clutches, it is he who she is most glad to be free from. If only there was a way to stay employed and not have to ever go back there again. To never have to teach, to never have to suffer...
But such fancies are just dreams, and as she drives home she sighs, best to put it out of mind.

Her day passes much as it always does, taking care of a few chores, hunting the local bars for vigourous young men to have her way with, when she notices something strange. She sees a man at the bar, a huge man, who must weigh 500 pounds or more, yet she thinks she knows him. She keeps her eye on him for much of the night, trying to put her finger on how she knows him, when finally at the bar he notices her.

"Edna, is that you?" he says
Edna turns to face him and looks surprised "ohhhhh, hi there...it's been too long" she says awkwardly, still not knowing who this huge man is.
He laughs however "Haha you don't know who I am do you? It's me, Clint. We dated a few years back"
Edna's eyes go wide as she remembers. Clint was an extremely hunky fireman she dated, he was in the peak of physical health and really sexy, but like with all her partners it didn't last. She takes in now just how much he has changed "wow, I didn't recognise you at all!"
Clint laughs again "yep I have changed quite a bit, it's all this" he says and jiggles his enormous belly "I got injured at work and took a year to heal, couldn't work out or anything and well, the weight just started piling on. By the time i was ready to go back to work they told me I was legally disabled because I was 'hyper obese', so now i get to stay at home and don't have to work, but still get paid as if i were. It's the best!"
Edna frowns "that doesn't sound right, is that really a thing?"
Clint smiles "it sure it, here let me find you the page" he says and takes out his phone and goes onto a website listing various laws both federal and state until he finds it, he hands it to her and for a few minutes she reads it.
"No way...!" she says in shock and awe "Full pay and never having to work again!"
"I know right!" Clint says "it's the best thing to ever happen to me"
"I'm tempted to do it myself" Edna chuckles "freedom from those brats at the school, to be free from the soul crushing shackles of that wretched school. It is all I dream about anymore"
"then do it" Clint says "gain the weight and free yourself"
Edna looks surprised at him and then thinks about it, she looks conflicted "I don't know. I mean, I'm still looking for a good man who I can settle down with and if i gain nearly 400 pounds that'll never happen. Plus, no offence, i'll be a freak, a laughing stock of town"
Clint just smirks "Edna, what town do we live in?"
"Springfield...why?" she frowns
"What is the fattest town in the fattest country in the world?" Clint asks
"...Springfield..." she answers
"So if there were one place in the entire world where being 450 pounds was not only socially acceptable but quite frankly, 'normal', where would that be?" Clint says more dramatically now
"Springfield!" Edna says getting more excited thanks to Clint's pushing
"Thats right! So how about it?" he asks
"yeah, alright. Lets do this!" Edna grins
"Atta girl" he grins back and climbs off of his multiple bar stools "then lets go to Krusty Burger, you've got a long way to go and Spring term starts in just a few months"
Edna nods and gets up going with him, caught up in the hype he generated, eager and excited to reach 450 lbs and free herself from Springfield Elementary once and for all.

So where to next?

1242.content:
The school bell rings at Springfield Elementary signifying the beginning of class. Regardless, all of the students continue their idle chatter. Ms. K, unhappy 5th grade teacher, stands at the front.

“Quiet down. I trust everyone has had a good weekend, especially after Friday’s big math test.”

The class nod their heads in agreement.

“Why yes. Ms. Krabappel”, Martin Prince announced proudly, hand raised in the air, “I had reunited with my uncle after his 3 year service in the war.”

Another kid spoke up, “My parents were able to open up a business in making cheap officially licensed products. Anybody want an ‘Official’ Pepsi-Cola Frisbee?”

“That’s great you two. It’s nice some people had something sweet happen to them this weekend,” Ms. K smiled, “Cause it’s going to be bitter tasting this.”

Edna passed by each desk and hands down an F graded paper.

“F. F. F. F. f. F. F. F. f.f.f.f.f.f…”

The class groans in disappointment. Bart Simpson, a student unfamiliar to failure, turns to Milhouse.

“Aw man, normally I can’t stand Ms. K, but lately all she’s been doing is hand out ‘F’s’ ever since she broke up with Luigi.”

“Yeah, and ever since Luigi broke up with Ms. K all he does is hand out uncooked spaghetti and death-threats. See?”

Milhouse holds up a slip of paper that read, “Leave a big tip or I’ll grind you-a face into a fine cannoli.”

“Mamamia!” Bart gasped.

“It’ll never taste the same again.”

Cut to the Treehouse in the Simpson’s backyard. Bart and Milhouse pace back and forth racking their heads together.

“We have to do something about Ms. Krabappel. If she keeps this up she’ll hold the whole class back a grade. I was too close to that once and I’m not letting anyone experience that.”

Milhouse spins around wide-eyed, “Wait, Bart! Does this mean we’re going to be the good guys this time?”

Hands folded behind his back Bart stares out the window and onto the Springfield horizon, “This time my friend, yes.”

“Alright! Now I can earn a gold star at home. My mom will love me again and I’ll finally get my puppy googoo back!”

“Okay, back to the plan. We need something to keep Ms. Krabappel permanently in a good mood so that everyone can get A’s. Even nimrods like Nelson.”

Milhouse rubbed his chin, “Hmm that sounds like a toughie. We could use the silly juice my dad drinks to keep him happy…but it also makes him very loud and pukey.”

Bart peers out of the Treehouse door to see Homer grumbling angrily while holding a plate of uncooked lard slathered pork chops. Unfortunately he trips on a rock and smacks his face on the hot grill, “YYAAAAAAAAAAAH!”

Homer, face scalding, runs amuck until he again trips and lands on a pork chop mouth first taking a hearty bite, “Mmm, That soothes the burning.”

“Hey! That’s it! All Krabappel will need is just some delicious, fatty food to keep her happy.”

“True, Bart. But, where would we find a constant supply of food like that?”

“Leave grunt that up to me gasp.”

Heaving up to the Treehouse is Lindsey Naegle. Business woman. Realtor. Entrepreneur. Millionaire. She’s looking a lot more plump than she normally does.

“Hey, you’re that lady that’s in my mom’s stupid book club. What happened to you? You look as bloated as my Gunter after child friendly Ocktoberfest.”

Bart’s words were true, Lindsay formerly fit and the ideal female image was now…obese. She sported a belly larger than Homer’s with big moldable love handles sitting on top of her widened hips. Her breasts, expanded to D cups, rested on her rotund belly and strained her ever shrinking bra. Lindsay wiped her brow with her meaty arms and used them to adjust her too short skirt. Not to mention her thighs which have grown tremendously thicker and gave an obvious sign that Lindsay’s butt had grown tremendously as well.

“Well young man. I was taking my ‘pain-in-the-heart’ walk through the neighborhood I couldn’t help, but to overhear your conversation”. She flashed a chubby grin.

“About feeding our teacher food?”, Bart crossed his arms.

“My ears are ringing!”

“How could you possibly help us?” Milhouse inquired.

“Well, as you couldn’t tell by my “fuller” physique, I’ve been addicted to a little substance called Cream of Lard. Seem familiar?”

“Not at all.”

“Darn alternate continuities. Anyhow, I need to get this splendid product on the market and I figured we could collaborate by pushing it onto your teacher. Then it will snowball to the whole faculty then who knows elsewhere.”

“Well. As long as Ms. K gets fat then what could be the harm? Looks like we have a deal, Lindsay.”

“Great! Meet me at the school at 6 AM sharp.” Lindsay turned to leave to reveal that the entire back of her sport coat had ripped open.

“Milhouse. We have found a gold mine.”

"Sorry, Bart. I stopped digging in my nose a while ago."

Edna Krabappel looked at the cookbook, then a the grocery bill, then looked at the scale, and finally looked at the mirror, "This is a mess you've gotten yourself into, Krabappel." Edna set the items down and walked away from the mirror. It's time for breakfast.

As she prepared her plain meal of egg whites and low-carb, low-calorie slices of toasted wheat thins, in her mid-end apartment. She reflected upon the reason why she had put on a whopping thirty pounds within the last two months, "Sure, it's a few slip ups of ordering an extra large pizza leading to guzzling down bottles of wine and soda, but once I found that stupid bakery, Top Muffins, BAM! I grew a muffin top!"

The heat from the stovetop began to diminish once Edna extinguished the flame. She began picking away at the tasteless breakfast that dreaded cookbook offered. Y'know. The ones that offered simple, tasty, yet somehow low-calorie meal preparations, that fail to keep her full after an hour of eating them, "Well, they ain't cheap or tasty. I oughta sue for false advertising!"

Ever since the purchase, Edna's found her grocery bill to quadruple in the usual amount. Turns out that fresh broccoli, salmon, and fat burning pills are more expensive than pre-packaged baked goods and meals from Krusty Burger. The elementary teacher sighed and looked at the book once more. A more than likely photoshopped picture of a happy, healthy, smiling woman looks back, "This is one hell of a pickle. On one hand, if I actually gather up the small shred of willpower that I have, I could actually shed this fat, but I'll probably be bankrupt by then! I mean, I could drop this and eat the way I used to," the thought of her being eighty pounds over weight entered her head. She thought of having to squeeze through doors, not fitting into her wardrobe, and worst of all, being an object of ridicule to her peers, especially to the class she teaches. "Hey, Mrs. Kra-druple bypass. Ahahaha!"

"Damn you, Bart!"

Edna shook her head. Well, this was the moment. The moment in which she decides to either use her small amount of willpower to lose weight while being broke or tip the scales and live comfortably.

She made mistakes, far too many. And every time she saw Homer around the Power Plant she would only drink more until it was finally too much and she was fired.

And so she has stayed at home since then. Drinking and eating her worries away. She doesn't really know how much time passed like this, nor how much she was letting herself go, until she got a horrible shock. A final warning notice from the bank, they were going to take her house away for not paying her mortgage for months.
"what the...how long has it been?" she mumbles and wades though all the junk covering the house. She opens the blinds on the windows and cringes at the bright light of the sun. She hadn't gone outside in quite some time, the light was unpleasant.
She turns on the tv and checks the date and nearly falls back when it dawns on her just how much time had passed since she was last sober. This was the wake up call she needed as she goes around the house opening all the curtains and blinds and windows.
She gets herself washed up, fixes her hair for the first time in what felt like for ages and gets her house tidied up. It feels refreshing to clear all the trash and get everything clean. Like she is letting go of her misery and past and getting ready for a new future.

Only problem was there was some things that she couldn't just get rid of. Mindy had put on a decent amount of weight during her months of depression, she wasn't 'fat' but wasn't the slim yet curvaceous woman she had been before moving to Springfield. She had put on about 20 lbs, and whilst it wasn't a huge amount it was noticeable as it made her hips wider, her rear plumper and her breasts larger. She was actually quite lucky, her voluptuous figure had absorbed much of the damage and so if anything it had made her sexier than ever.
"hmm, not bad" she says standing before a mirror in her too tight bra and panties "bigger than I was, but I think I can make this work until i manage to lose it again"

She gets herself dressed and gets ready to hit the town. She needs to find herself a job as soon as possible to keep her house and she needs to make herself look as good as possible. No job is too low, she just needs something to get back on her feet.

What job does Mindy get?

1253312221.content:
After losing her job at the Power Plant for excessive drinking Mindy bounced around between jobs for a while, never really managing to hold any place down. Her current employer is Professor Frink who needs a new assistant after his wife left him. The job is pretty straight forwards, passing him tools, running simple errands for him, nothing befitting a woman with her qualifications.

One day as she is cleaning up whilst drinking she puts her beer bottle down among a collection of bottles as her phone starts to ring. She answers but it is just junk mail so she hangs up. Sighing she reaches over to grab her beer without looking and instead accidentally grabs an identical shaped bottle with a strange purple liquid inside. She downs the entire drink in one go before realizing that wasn't her beer. "Doh!" she remarks "I can't get fired from ANOTHER job" she says, fretting. She looks around for some way to cover her mistake, fretting more about getting in trouble than about the strange substance she just consumed.

She is able to cover it up by mixing food dye with her beer and putting it in the place before quickly rushing home, making some excuse that she was ill or something.

As she gets outside her stomach starts growling angrily and she doubles over in pain. She is so hungry! She has never felt hunger like this before in her entire life.
Unable to think about anything but food she jumps onto her motorcycle and rushes straight to Krusty burger, a place that she knew would have plenty of food immediately to hand. No waiting around required.

She rushes inside and orders and obscene amount of food, demanding they bring every bit to her the moment it arrives, immediately devouring every food item the second it is brought to her. She eats everything, utterly relentlessly. Every burger, every french fry, every morsel and still it is not enough...

A device called a 'Fatsorber', a device that can transfer the body fat from one person to another. The user can device how much or how little to take. 12533222222211.content:
Ruth slumped into her chair, tearing her bandana off and tossing it aside. She dropped her head into her hands, dreading the feeling she was overcome with. Despite the strong front she put on, she still felt hurt from her divorce, even despite how oafish her former husband was. It hit her especially hard nowadays with her daughter Laura gone and little to no future prospects because of her time spent in prison. A soft dribbling noise caused her to look up through her fingers. In front of her rested the bags from Krusty Burger, grease starting to drip through the bags. She also felt a small amount of disgust at the food she had been eating, but she had taken to eating far more food recently, and it helped dull the pain she felt, as did the copious amounts of alcohol that she tended to drink. With a groan, she forced herself to tear into the first bag, feeling the greasy mess squishing first in her fingers, and then in her mouth as she glutted herself.

The large amounts of fattening food and alcohol, as well as the lack of activity conspired against her. She knew that she had been putting on some weight, but she couldn’t build up the willpower to deal with it, nor any real feelings against her expanding body. After her stint with the steroids, she had actually started to dislike the sharp angles and muscular bulges of her body. The new layer of fat settling across her form helped soften all of that, and each time she looked in the mirror, she had to actually admit that she didn’t actively dislike her new growing appearance.

Breaking open another can of Duff, she washed down another Krusty Burger, and another, feeling the now familiar ache of her stomach being pushed to its limits, as well as the haze of the beer flooding her mind. Both helped push her emotional pain aside again for a time. Grabbing the last burger, she pushed back from the table, wobbling slightly as she walked through her house. Shoving the last of the meaty fatty mess into her mouth, she teetered towards the bathroom, a sudden urge to check her weight poking through the fog wrapping her mind. It took her several tries to actually stand on the scale long enough, as well as looking down at the little dial, but she finally made it, taking another short while to comprehend what the numbers were telling her.
12533222222211.title: Another day, another pound

choices: Head home to get ready for the drudgery.
125332222222113.content:
Fifty pounds, ever since she had started this downward spiral, Ruth had gained fifty whole pounds. Or fifty one actually with the way the needle was resting. Sure some of it could be ascribed to the food and beer churning away within her gut, but not all of it. Looking up in the mirror, she couldn’t even begin to think how she had missed all of the weight she had gained. She knew that she had gained some weight, but not nearly all of this. Her bust looked several sizes larger, a crescent of soft yellow stomach flesh now peeked out from under the edge of her shirt, and even her hips had broadened out and strained her pants. Seeing this didn’t stir up any feelings of disgust or anything against her widening body, there was actually a small kernel of contentment that was buried deep within, but it still presented itself. Turning away from the mirror, she quickly stripped, feeling the softness giving as she pressed around her body. A quick shower later, and she dried herself off on the way to bed. As she drifted off to sleep, she found that she couldn’t stop her hands from idling stroking and grabbing the layer of fat.

The next morning Ruth felt a bit better, at least till she remembered everything as usual. With a depressed sigh, she got ready for another day. Her job wasn’t great, and the money was even worse, but at least it helped keep her afloat for now. She still looked for a better job whenever she could, but it seemed like so many buildings in Springfield seemed empty most times or weren’t in the same place twice. After finishing work for the day, Ruth found herself walking along, and before long she found herself outside of Moe’s Tavern. The thought of a cold Duff or three was tempting, as was the idea of sitting around with other boozehounds who were as depressed as she was. She also thought about just heading home, and waiting for tomorrow to do it all over again. Then a third option poked into her mind: she could head over to the Simpson’s house and check in with Marge, it had been a while since their run in together when she convinced Marge to take steroids as well.
125332222222113.title: Yet another day

125332222222231.title: A soon-to-be weighty princess

choices: Eating her way to a better life
1253322222222311.content:
Shawna Tifton dashed through her apartment door, making sure that none of her “fans” had seen where she had fled. Yet another day spent with various drunks and other malcontents leering at her body all day and night. At first, it had been kind of a joy to get all of the attention, as she had wanted when she got into the business, but it had started to become too much of a chore recently, especially after that one follower who had been following her – Impson or some such was his name, she thought – had given a heartfelt speech about not treating woman as just objects. There had to be a way to stop attracting so much attention, but with her body it was next to impossible not to attract attention.

With a groan she stormed away from the door, dropping the bag from the Kwik-E-Mart on the counter. Her careless placement caused the bag to tumble over, the contents spilling out across the floor. With a deeper groan, she turned back and started picking everything up. She dropped everything when she came across the magazine she had grabbed while trying to hide her face. She hadn’t even seen or read anything in the magazine, but the cover caught her eye now. The cover showed Sara Sloane, the famous actress, in an unflattering photo after obviously gaining quite a bit of weight. The article inside had a few more shots of the actress, each showing her a bit larger than the last, and hinted about how a bad relationship breakup had ended up the woman gaining quite a bit of weight. There were also hints about how her popularity as an actress had fallen quite a bit; creating a cycle that caused her weight to continue to soar.

Shawna looked up from the magazine, then back down over her pert bust. A wild thought crossed her mind, and despite all efforts, the thought wouldn’t go away. Then she imagined her body swelling with pound over pound of fat, her thin frame buried and hidden away within a blubbery and bloated guise. She shook her head to try and dispel the thought, and tossed the magazine away so that it landed so that she couldn’t see that cover image. Picking up the rest of the fallen items, she went about her business. Each time she let her mind wander though, the image of her fat swollen body kept rising to the surface, and each time the thought seemed more and more like the solution to her problem.

Finally, she dashed back into the living room, snatching up the discarded magazine and flipping through the photos of the fattened actress. Letting the magazine flop into her lap, she tried to wrap her mind around what she was thinking: did she really want to risk everything and purposefully put on weight to get some peace? She came to the conclusion that yes, she did. Plus, she had quite a little nest egg stored up – especially with some of the compromising situations that some influential people paid big bucks to keep quiet – so she could always change back when or if she decided to.

The only question that remained to her was how, how was she going to get fat? There was always the old fashioned way of just eating as much as she could; she had always been careful to watch what she ate, and had sometimes thought about being able to eat just a bit more, and this would be her chance. That way might not be fast enough though, and she wanted to be rid of her fame as fast as possible. Another possibility drifted to the forefront: that Homer Impson fellow, he certainly looked like he knew a thing or two about putting on weight, maybe he could teach her something. Shawna had a third idea when her gaze settled on the observatory on a hill outside of Springfield: Professor Frink, the odd little man had never bothered her as much as others, so she didn’t have much of a problem with him, and maybe she could “convince” him to help her out with her new plan.

Now, which one should she choose, which one, she thought again and again as she tapped a finger on her lips.
1253322222222311.title: The beginnings of a plan
